NeoWolfFangFist.name: Neo Wolf Fang Fist
NeoWolfFangFist.desc: A move from Yamcha himself, but you'd probably live long enough to actually use it, lmfao. Use your fists to strike the opponent and send them back with a mighty finishing punch

AwakenSlap.name: AwakenSlap
AwakenSlap.desc: A bold slap to one foe's face in an attempt to wake them up.

LuckyPunch.name: LuckyPunch
LuckyPunch.desc: Deals miniscule strike damage to one foe, but has a high critical hit chance in return.

DoubleHit.name: DoubleHit
DoubleHit.desc: The user slams the target with a long tail, vines, or a tentacle. The target is hit twice in a row.

Chase.name: Chase
Chase.desc: Let multiple Grassimps chase after your foes.

TwinklePunch.name: TwinklePunch
TwinklePunch.desc: The user punches the foe lightly. This skill has a high chance to be a critical hit.

HystericalSlap.name: HystericalSlap
HystericalSlap.desc: The user slaps the foe hard on the head. This may also inflict Dizziness.

BoneToss.name: Bone Toss
BoneToss.desc: The user tosses the bone it holds. The bone then returns to the user. This attack hits twice, once when thrown and once when returning. This skill has a higher chance to land as a critical hit.

WindmillKick.name: WindmillKick
WindmillKick.desc: The target kicks the foe three times in quick motion

FinalBlow.name: Final Blow
FinalBlow.desc: A skill that gets stronger for each Affinity Point the user has.

ViseGrip.name: Vise Grip
ViseGrip.desc: The target is gripped and squeezed from both sides to inflict damage.

MiraclePunch.name: MiraclePunch
MiraclePunch.desc: Deals medium-light strike damage to one foe, but has a high critical hit chance.

MiracleRush.name: MiracleRush
MiracleRush.desc: Deals medium-light strike damage to all foes, but has a high critical hit chance.

TornadoSpin.name: Tornado Spin
TornadoSpin.desc: The user spins, arms extended, hitting all foes 3 times.

WingAttack.name: Wing Attack
WingAttack.desc: The target is struck with large, imposing wings spread wide to inflict damage.

VacuumWave.name: Vacuum Wave
VacuumWave.desc: The user whirls its fists to send a wave of pure vacuum at the target.

DualWingbeat.name: DualWingbeat
DualWingbeat.desc: The user slams the target with its wings. The target is hit twice in a row.

Agneyastra.name: Agneyastra
Agneyastra.desc: The user discharges a weapon of mass damage, hitting all foes 3 times.

BoneRush.name: Bone Rush
BoneRush.desc: The user strikes twice with a held bone. There is a low chance to inflict dizziness with this attack.

Headbutt.name: Headbutt
Headbutt.desc: The user charges towards the foe, and lunges at them to attack using their head.

WolfFangFist.name: Wolf-Fang Fist
WolfFangFist.desc: The user channels Wolf-like energy into their fists, punching the enemy in a three hit combo.

ShadowChop.name: Shadow Chop
ShadowChop.desc: The user attacks the opponent with a chop of with excessive force. This skill has a high chance to be a critical hit.

Last-Resort.name: Last Resort
Last-Resort.desc: The user uses this as a last resort skill. Requires less than 40% of the user's current MP to use. This skill cannot miss.

StrikeOfFury.name: Strike of Fury
StrikeOfFury.desc: The user, in a state of rage, launches towards the foe to deliver a heavy punch in retaliation for an ally.

ThunderGodDance.name: Thunder God Dance
ThunderGodDance.desc: The user performs a mystical set of sword slashes to deal damage.

SpinSlash.name: SpinSlash
SpinSlash.desc: It inflicts damage on all foes surrounding the user.

3CutShock.name: 3CutShock
3CutShock.desc: The user sends out three consecutive slash shockwaves with their own scythe, dealing damage to the target.

HurricaneSlash.name: HurricaneSlash
HurricaneSlash.desc: The user spins around with their weapon pointed outward.

QuickSlash.name: Quick Slash
QuickSlash.desc: The user slashes the enemy twice at quick speed.

X-Scissor.name: X-Scissor
X-Scissor.desc: The user slashes at the target by crossing its scythes or claws as if they were a pair of scissors.

TornadoSlash.name: Tornado Slash
TornadoSlash.desc: The uses slashes in a tornado-like fashion.

UnseenSlashes.name: Unseen Slashes
UnseenSlashes.desc: The user slashes the enemy 3 times at a speed so fast, it's barely visible.

GreatSlash.desc: The user puts all their power into one strong slash.
GreatSlash.name: GreatSlash

CrossSlash.name: CrossSlash
CrossSlash.desc: The user slashes the foe in a cross motion. This skill can inflict bleeding.

SupremeSlash.desc: The user puts all their power into one large slash. There is a high chance of inflicting bleed here.
SupremeSlash.name: SupremeSlash

CrystalShots.name: Crystal Shots
CrystalShots.desc: The user shoots 3 sharp gems at the foe.

StarThrust.name: StarThrust
StarThrust.desc: The user deftly strikes the opponent with five calculated thrusts in a star-pattern.

SharpChomp-I.name: SharpChomp-I
SharpChomp-I.desc: A single bite directed at one foe. Has a low chance of causing Bleed.

ProngedThrust.name: ProngedThrust
ProngedThrust.desc: The user swiftly delivers a single thrust at the opponent.

2ProngedThrust.name: 2-ProngedThrust
2ProngedThrust.desc: The user swiftly delivers two precise thrusts towards the opponent.

3ProngedThrust.name: 3-ProngedThrust
3ProngedThrust.desc: The user swiftly delivers three pinpoint thrusts towards the opponent.

SharpChomp-II.name: SharpChomp-II
SharpChomp-II.desc: Two bites directed at one foe. Has a low chance of causing Bleed.

SharpChomp-III.name: SharpChomp-III
SharpChomp-III.desc: Three bites directed at one foe. Has a low chance of causing Bleed.

WolfBite.name: WolfBite
WolfBite.desc: The user bites a single foe twice.

JewelDrill.name: Jewel Drill
JewelDrill.desc: The user drills into the target with a sharp crystal. This skill has a high critical hit chance.

CruelAttack.name: Cruel Attack
CruelAttack.desc: Medium Pierce damage to a single foe.

Shuriken.name: Shuriken
Shuriken.desc: The user throws a Sharp Shuriken at the opponent with a low chance to inflict bleeding.

BrainBite.name: Brain Bite
BrainBite.desc: The user dashes forward, biting the opponent's head with their large jaws. This skill has a moderate chance of inflicting dizziness.

CruelAssault.name: CruelAssault
CruelAssault.desc: Heavy Pierce damage to one foe. Can land Critical Hits more easily. May inflict Bleed.

RapierStrike.name: Rapier Strike
RapierStrike.desc: The user uses their rapier to strike the foe. This skill has a moderate chance to inflict bleeding.

FlameCurse.name: Flame Curse
FlameCurse.desc: Weak fire skill with very high burn chance.

ScorchSlap.name: ScorchSlap
ScorchSlap.desc: With their hand imbued in flames, the user slaps the target. Very low chance to burn.

FirePledge.name: Fire Pledge
FirePledge.desc: A column of fire hits the target.

ToastedSands.name: Toasted Sands
ToastedSands.desc: The user blows burning hot sand at it's opponent.

BlazeKick.name: Blaze Kick
BlazeKick.desc: The user ignites their feet and strikes the opponent. This move has a very high critical hit rate. This move may burn the opponent.

FlarePunch.name: Flare Punch
FlarePunch.desc: The user imbues their fist with flame, and strikes the opponent. Very low chance to burn.

MortemFlames.name: Mortem Flames
MortemFlames.desc: The user fires a green flame at the foe, with a chance to burn them.

BurningSpirit.name: Burning Spirit
BurningSpirit.desc: The user harnesses learned powers from ancient shamans to fire a spirit of burning souls at the foe.

TriFluch.name: TriFluch
TriFluch.desc: The user delivers three quick punches into an opponent with their fists cloakednin flames. Has a very low chance of causing a burn.

BurnUp.name: Burn Up
BurnUp.desc: The user burns itself out, removing all resistances, blocks, repels and drains of fire from the user.

MonkeyBomb.name: MonkeyBomb
MonkeyBomb.desc: The user throws a Cymbal Monkey with a bomb strapped to it that plays a tune, to distract the enemies from battle completely, before exploding. Sometimes it works.

ConflagrationPummel.name: ConflagrationPummel
ConflagrationPummel.desc: The user heavily strikes the opponent while imbued in flames. Very low chance to burn.

Fire-Tornado.name: Fire-Tornado
Fire-Tornado.desc: Summon a whirling wall of flames to envelop your enemy in.

Overheat.name: Overheat
Overheat.desc: The user unleashes a burning fury at full power. The attack's recoil harshly debuffs the user's magic.

BlueFlare.name: Blue Flare
BlueFlare.desc: The user spreads a blue fire in an attempt to burn the foe.

FlareLaser.name: Flare Laser
FlareLaser.desc: The user fires a laser of fires at the foe.

Trisagion.name: Trisagion
Trisagion.desc: The user summons a mass of flames to burn the target. This skill has very low accuracy, but a very high chance to burn the opponent.

SurgingStrikes.name: Surging Strikes
SurgingStrikes.desc: The user, having mastered the Water style, strikes the target with a flowing motion three times in a row. This attack always results in a critical hit.

WaterShuriken.name: WaterShuriken
WaterShuriken.desc: The user hits the target with throwing stars up to five times in a row.

WaterGun.name: WaterGun
WaterGun.desc: The target is blasted with a forceful shot of water.

Waterfall.name: Waterfall
Waterfall.desc: The target is hit with a blow packing the power of fish traveling up waterfalls. This may paralyze the target. This can also be used to climb a waterfall.

WaterPledge.name: WaterPledge
WaterPledge.desc: A column of water hits the target.

WaterPulse.name: WaterPulse
WaterPulse.desc: The user attacks the target with a pulsing blast of water. This may also brainwash the target.

Crabhammer.name: Crabhammer
Crabhammer.desc: The target is hammered with a large pincer. Critical hits land more easily.

WaterCyclone.name: Water Cyclone
WaterCyclone.desc: The user surrounds the foe in a spinning ring of water to inflict damage. This skill has a low chance of inflicting dizziness.

OriginPulse.name: OriginPulse
OriginPulse.desc: The user attacks all enemies with countless beams of light that glow a deep and brilliant blue.

HydroPump.name: HydroPump
HydroPump.desc: The target is blasted by a huge volume of water launched under great pressure.

PowderSnow.name: PowderSnow
PowderSnow.desc: The user attacks with a chilling gust of powdery snow. This may also freeze opposing foes.

FreezingMist.name: Freezing Mist
FreezingMist.desc: The user lets out a freezing mist with a high chance to freeze the foes.

SheerCold.name: Sheer Cold
SheerCold.desc: The user covers the foe in an intense cold. So cold, it will instantly defeat the target.

FrozenDaggers.name: FrozenDaggers
FrozenDaggers.desc: The user shoots three daggers made of pure ice at a target, which has a chance to cause bleeding to them

TwinIcicle.name: TwinIcicle
TwinIcicle.desc: Twin Icicles stabbed into a foe, can cause bleeding 20% of the time

IceFang.name: IceFang
IceFang.desc: The user bites with cold-infused fangs. It may also freeze or critically hit.

IcicleCrash.name: IcicleCrash
IcicleCrash.desc: The user makes a bunch of icicles crash onto the opposing side, with the potential to cause dizzyness to them.

IcyCannon.name: IcyCannon
IcyCannon.desc: The user fires a beam of ice at the foe. This skill has a high chance to freeze the foe.

IcicleShower.name: IcicleShower
IcicleShower.desc: The user send 4 extremely sharp icicles at an opponent. Bleed is a low chance to happen when this move hits.

IceBeam.name: IceBeam
IceBeam.desc: The target is struck with an icy-cold beam of energy. It may also freeze the target solid.

Blizzard.name: Blizzard
Blizzard.desc: A howling blizzard is summoned to strike the opposing foes. This can cause a foe to be frozen.

Impulse.name: Impulse
Impulse.desc: The user attacks with strong static electricity. This attack will paralyse alot of the time.

Anti-MaterialZap.name: Anti-Material Zap
Anti-MaterialZap.desc: The user sends a concentrated amped up surge of electricity to their target, of which can most likely Paralyze  and incapacitate them. Can also be used on electronics, and as a self defense system (Passive not included).

VoltLunge.name: VoltLunge
VoltLunge.desc: The user imbues theirselves in electricity, and charges into the opponent. Very low chance to paralyze.

ZapCannon.name: ZapCannon
ZapCannon.desc: The user fires an electric blast like a cannon to inflict damage and cause paralysis.

ThunderFang.name: ThunderFang
ThunderFang.desc: The user imbues electrical power into their fangs and bite at a single opponent. Has a 15% chance of stunning/paralyzing the foe.

LightningTackle.name: LightningTackle
LightningTackle.desc: The user imbues themselves with electricity, and tackles the opponent at lightning (:)) speed. Very low chance to paralyze.

Twister.name: Twister
Twister.desc: The user whips up a vicious tornado to tear at opposing foes. This may also make them paralyzed.

WindySands.desc: The user starts a wind that damages all fighters
WindySands.name: Windy Sands

TornadoCutter.name: TornadoCutter
TornadoCutter.desc: The user summons cutters of wind to cut through the foe twice times.

WindPunch.name: WindPunch
WindPunch.desc: A strong force of wind hits the opponent twice.

MagicalBlast.name: MagicalBlast
MagicalBlast.desc: The user creates a strong force of wind. Low chance of inflicting dizziness.

DragonAscent.name: DragonAscent
DragonAscent.desc: After soaring upward, the user attacks its target by dropping out of the sky at high speeds. But it lowers its own Endurance stats in the process.

AirSlash.name: AirSlash
AirSlash.desc: The user attacks with a blade of air that slices even the sky. It may also make the target bleed.

Bonemerang.name: Bonemerang
Bonemerang.desc: The user throws the bone it holds. The bone loops to hit the target twice, coming and going.

BoneClub.name: BoneClub
BoneClub.desc: The user clubs the target with a bone. This may also paralyze the target.

Sandstorm.desc: The user starts up a sandstorm that attacks all fighters in the battlefield. This move has a higher chance to be a critical hit than others.
Sandstorm.name: Sandstorm

SandTomb.desc: The user rains sand down onto the opponent. There is a very high chance of this move to be a critical hit.
SandTomb.name: Sand-Tomb

Earthquake.name: Earthquake
Earthquake.desc: The user stamps and causes an earthquake that attacks all fighters.

EarthPower.name: EarthPower
EarthPower.desc: The user causes earth to rise from the ground.

BulletSeed.name: BulletSeed
BulletSeed.desc: The user forcefully shoots seeds at the target two to five times in a row.

LeafyKunai.name: Leafy Kunai
LeafyKunai.desc: The user throws 5 kunais made of leaves at the target.

VineWhip.name: VineWhip
VineWhip.desc: The target is struck with slender, whiplike vines to inflict damage.

NeedleArm.name: NeedleArm
NeedleArm.desc: The user attacks by wildly swinging its thorny arms. This may also paralyze the target. (look paralyze was that closest to flinch, Spectra)

Sun-beam.desc: The user gathers energy from the sun and fires it with a strong energy.
Sun-beam.name: Sun-beam

GigaDrain.name: GigaDrain
GigaDrain.desc: The user drains the life energy of the target. Half of the damage dealt, the user restores.

MagicalLeaf.name: MagicalLeaf
MagicalLeaf.desc: The user scatters curious leaves that chase the target. This attack never misses.

LeafCyclone.name: LeafCyclone
LeafCyclone.desc: The User is surrounded by sharp leaves then sends them flying at the opponent.

LeafBlade.name: Leaf Blade
LeafBlade.desc: The user handles a sharp leaf like a sword and attacks by cutting its target. Critical hits land more easily.

CopySkill.name: Copy Skill
CopySkill.desc: Uses psychic powers to use an ally skill at random.

WayOfMirroringYourself.name: Way of Mirroring Yourself
WayOfMirroringYourself.desc:
You can essentially think of it as Kirby's Mirror ability named Mirror Body.
The user splits themself with a spirit, or whatever you have as a spirit, and deal damage from distance. It attacks on appear and on retraction.

AuraSpear.name: AuraSpear
AuraSpear.desc: The user channels energy into their palm and fires it out in the form of a spear

ZenHeadbutt.name: ZenHeadbutt
ZenHeadbutt.desc: The user focuses its willpower to its head and strikes the target. This may also paralyze the foe.

AuraScythe.name: AuraScythe
AuraScythe.desc: Two energy balls are made into a scythe, slashing an enemy three times.

AuraSphere.name: AuraSphere
AuraSphere.desc: The user channels energy into their hand and throws it as an explosive ball.

PsyCannon.name: Psy Cannon
PsyCannon.desc: The user fires an explosive beam of psychic energy at the foe. This skill has a moderate chance to inflict brainwash.

AuraBarrage.name: AuraBarrage
AuraBarrage.desc: Multiple energy balls surround a foe, closing in to create a big explosion.

Twineedle.name: Twineedle
Twineedle.desc: The user damages the target twice in succession by jabbing it with two spikes. This may also poison the target.

PoisonOoze.name: Poison Ooze
PoisonOoze.desc: The user fakes out the target, before bypassing their defenses and tossing a poisonous ball at them. This skill bypasses Protect skills like Protect, Makarakarn, Tetrakarn & Web Trap.

PoisonTail.name: PoisonTail
PoisonTail.desc: The user hits the target with its tail. This may also poison the target. Critical hits land more easily.

GearGrind.name: GearGrind
GearGrind.desc: The user attacks by throwing steel gears at its target twice.

TrainSlam.name: TrainSlam
TrainSlam.desc: The user slams their metal or metal-like body straight into their opponent with the power of a steam train head on.

TitaniumPistons.name: TitaniumPistons
TitaniumPistons.desc: Using their fists in a manner of pistons, the user strikes the opponent into their face with a strong force to have a really better odds of causing dizzy.

Colbalt-FusedCyclone.name: Colbalt-FusedCyclone
Colbalt-FusedCyclone.desc: Using the power of colbalt in a blade or device, the user spins at all their foes to deal damage. 10% chance of bleeding can occur.

SteelSlam.name: SteelSlam
SteelSlam.desc: Using a steel object or their body, the user slams their body/the object straight into the opponent's skull. This has a better chance of inflicting dizzy.

Mafrei.name: Mafrei
Mafrei.desc: The user causes toxic explosions around the targets.

AtomicRain.name: AtomicRain
AtomicRain.desc: The user causes a rain of nuclear energy to rain down on the foes. This skill has a high chance of inflicting poison.

Mafreila.name: Mafreila
Mafreila.desc: The user causes toxic explosions to appear around the targets.

RadioactiveTackle.name: RadioactiveTackle
RadioactiveTackle.desc: The user embues their body with radioactive energy and tackle their target with the energy

WastefulLunch.name: WastefulLunch
WastefulLunch.desc: The user tosses a lunch wasted at the opponent, which most dub as the 'science experiment' in the fridge. 1/3rd chance of poisoning the opponent

NuclearFall.name: NuclearFall
NuclearFall.desc: The user summons nuclear radiation and makes two orbs of the radiation go at a singular opponent

NuclearSpin.name: NuclearSpin
NuclearSpin.desc: Using their body and radiation, the user spins at a quick speed into the opposition. 10% chance of poisoning.

NuclearBash.name: NuclearBash
NuclearBash.desc: Using the power of nuclear waste, the user bashes straight into an opponent with the energy.

Mafreidyne.name: Mafreidyne
Mafreidyne.desc: The user causes toxic explosions to appear around the targets.

AtomicCrunch.name: AtomicCrunch
AtomicCrunch.desc: The power of Atom is used in a seriously painful body slam that would be very painful for a single foe.

Ping.name: Ping
Ping.desc: God damnit, ~~@~~everyone AGAIN. Has a moderate chance to cause Rage.

Mudo.name: Mudo
Mudo.desc: The user casts a demonic spell with the power to instantly down the foe 15% of the time.

Mamudo.name: Mamudo
Mamudo.desc: The user casts a demonic spell with the power to instantly down the foes 15% of the time.

Mudoon.name: Mudoon
Mudoon.desc: The user casts a demonic spell with the power to instantly down the foe 35% of the time.

Mamudoon.name: Mamudoon
Mamudoon.desc: The user casts a demonic spell with the power to instantly down the foes 35% of the time.

DieForMe.name: Die For Me!
DieForMe.desc: The user casts a demonic spell with the power to instantly down the foes 80% of the time.

ShadowStriking.name: Shadow Striking
ShadowStriking.desc: Dark hands strike an opponent 3 times, but it takes up a good chunk of HP

Maeiga.name: Maeiga
Maeiga.desc: The user damages the opposing side with darkness.

Eiga.name: Eiga
Eiga.desc: The user damages one foe with darkness.

Feint.name: Feint
Feint.desc: The user fakes out the target, before bypassing their defenses and sucker punching them in their blindspot. This skill bypasses Protect skills like Protect, Makarakarn, Tetrakarn & Web Trap.

YowlingSpirits.name: Yowling Spirits
YowlingSpirits.desc: The user causes an explosion of screaming spirits to appear infront of them. A low chance of inflicting fear..

ShadowSpirit.name: Shadow Spirit
ShadowSpirit.desc: The user fires a spirit at the target.

CruelIntent.name: Cruel Intent
CruelIntent.desc: The user damages one foe with a fiendish strike from behind. A low chance of inflicting dizziness.

SpiritHorns.name: Spirit Horns
SpiritHorns.desc: The user stabs their target horns manifested from spirits.

ShadowyBlast.name: ShadowyBlast
ShadowyBlast.desc: A shadowy blast that only Lan is able to accomplish to a single foe. Remember that it has a very low chance of dizzy

ShadowStrike.name: Shadow Strike
ShadowStrike.desc: The target envelops their hand in a void-like energy and strikes the foe with one very strong hit.

Maeigaon.name: Maeigaon
Maeigaon.desc: The user damages the opposing side with light.

Eigaon.name: Eigaon
Eigaon.desc: The user harnesses the shadows to attack.

ShadowEdge.name: ShadowEdge
ShadowEdge.desc: Imbued with dark magic, the user slashes at the target.

EndlessLight.name: EndlessLight
EndlessLight.desc: The user endlessly barrages the foe with light until they miss.

Kouha.name: Kouha
Kouha.desc: The user damages their foe with light.

Makouha.name: Makouha
Makouha.desc: The user damages the opposing side with light.

Starshower.name: Starshower
Starshower.desc: The user harnesses the power of the stars to create a meteor shower, striking the foes twice.

Hama.name: Hama
Hama.desc: The user casts a godly spell with the power to instantly down the foe 15% of the time.

Mahama.name: Mahama
Mahama.desc: The user casts a godly spell with the power to instantly down the foes 15% of the time.

Hamaon.name: Hamaon
Hamaon.desc: The user casts a godly spell with the power to instantly down the foe 35% of the time.

Mahamaon.name: Mahamaon
Mahamaon.desc: The user casts a godly spell with the power to instantly down the foes 35% of the time.

Samsara.name: Samsara
Samsara.desc: The user casts a godly spell with the power to instantly down the foes 80% of the time.

VengefulSpirit.name: Vengeful Spirit
VengefulSpirit.desc: The user fires a spirit at the target.

Kouga.name: Kouga
Kouga.desc: The user damages their foe with light.

Makouga.name: Makouga
Makouga.desc: The user damages the opposing side with light.

EyeCannon.name: Eye Cannon
EyeCannon.desc: The user uses their eyes to fire a shot of light.

Tribeam.name: Tribeam
Tribeam.desc: The User channels energy into their hands and fires a beam at a single opponent, but it takes a hefty toll on their health in exchange for its power

Kamehameha.name: Kamehameha
Kamehameha.desc: A Ki Blast fired from your hands, in a form of a beam, at a single foe

NeoTribeam.name: NeoTribeam
NeoTribeam.desc: The more powered up version of the Tribeam. It costs more HP to use, but has more punch and hits the opponent up to 3 times.

Kougaon.name: Kougaon
Kougaon.desc: The user blinds their foe with light.

Makougaon.name: Makougaon
Makougaon.desc: The user blinds the opposing side with light.

Starfall.name: Starfall
Starfall.desc: The user harnesses the power of the stars to strike the foe.

MegaRave.name: Mega Rave
MegaRave.desc: A sphere of bundled light magic is sent to the foe, dealing damage.

HolyHandGrenade.name: Holy Hand-Grenade
HolyHandGrenade.desc: The user summons an overflowing amount of concentrated light energy, confines it to a ball in the shape of a grenade, and throws it to the opposing side. When it explodes it can blind almost anything, assuming assuming the explosion actually hits of course. It has pretty bad recoil in gathering the light energy, so be careful.

SKamehameha.name: SKamehameha
SKamehameha.desc: A powered up version of the normal Kamehameha, does more damage, but costs much more.

PKamehameha.name: PKamehameha
PKamehameha.desc: Cell's very own version of the Kamehameha, but 'perfect'. Does way more damage than S.Kamehameha, but at the cost of Higher MP and lowered Accuracy.

UKamehameha.name: UKamehameha
UKamehameha.desc: The Ultimate Kamehameha that Gogeta used. Very lowered Accuracy, with a very high power and Mp cost

MasterSpark.name: MasterSpark
MasterSpark.desc: Burn all of your MP to unleash a gigantic beam of destructive energy at the opponent.

SpiritDrain.name: Spirit Drain
SpiritDrain.desc: The user drains 20 MP from the target by any means necessary. They will gain all MP stolen.

SpiritLeech.name: Spirit Leech
SpiritLeech.desc: The user drains 50 MP from the target by any means necessary. They will gain all MP stolen.

Zan.name: Zan
Zan.desc: The user blasts their target with a strong gale.

Mazan.name: Mazan
Mazan.desc: The user blasts the targets with a strong gale.

NoDodging.name: NoDodging
NoDodging.desc: You're not allowed to dodge this attack.

Hug.name: Hug
Hug.desc: The user walks up to the target in a defenseless manner, and hugs the target. LITTLE DOES THE TARGET KNOW, THE HUG GENERATES THE ENERGY OF 1000 SUNS AND SPONTANEOUSLY RELEASES IT IN ONE GIANT EXPLOSION. The user also gets caught up in their own explosion, fainting them in the process.

LifeDrain.name: LifeDrain
LifeDrain.desc: The user drains half of the damage dealt to the foe.

Zanma.name: Zanma
Zanma.desc: The user blasts their target with a strong gale.

Mazanma.name: Mazanma
Mazanma.desc: The user blasts the targets with a strong gale.

Megido.name: Megido
Megido.desc: The user causes a small explosion of high power to hit the targets.

LifeLeech.name: LifeLeech
LifeLeech.desc: The user drains half of the damage dealt to the foe.

Zandyne.name: Zandyne
Zandyne.desc: The user blasts their target with a strong gale.

Mazandyne.name: Mazandyne
Mazandyne.desc: The user blasts the targets with a strong gale.

undefined.name: undefined
undefined.desc: The user digs through the depths of Bloom Battler and breaks it, damaging everyone else on the battlefield.

SoulSacrifice.name: Soul Sacrifice
SoulSacrifice.desc: The user deals big damage to all fighters, but is killed in the process.

LastResort.name: Last Resort
LastResort.desc: The user deals massive damage to all fighters with an explosion. The user faints in the process.

Illuminate.name: Illuminate
Illuminate.desc: Used by the Goddess of the Infection, of light herself, to blind her foes. Low chance to inflict Dizziness.

VaporisingRay.name: Vaporising Ray
VaporisingRay.desc: The user blasts their target with a vaporising laser.

Megidola.name: Megidola
Megidola.desc: The user causes a large explosion of high power to hit the targets.

GooeyExplosion.name: Gooey Explosion
GooeyExplosion.desc: The user explodes to deal massive damage. The user faints in the process.

Self-Destruct.name: Self-Destruct
Self-Destruct.desc: The user explodes to deal massive damage. The user faints in the process.

Megidolaon.name: Megidolaon
Megidolaon.desc: A very strong skill, legendary for it's power, and level of destruction

Explosion.name: Explosion
Explosion.desc: The user explodes to deal massive damage. It also makes the user faint.

ExplosiveCharge.name: ExplosiveCharge
ExplosiveCharge.desc: A powerful charged explosion that deals massive damage to all fighters. But it kills the user.

BlackViper.name: Black Viper
BlackViper.desc: This legendary Almighty Type Skill does massive damage in which a Snake from the shadows crunches the foe.

MorningStar.name: Morning Star
MorningStar.desc: A legendary Almighty Type Skill in which the user harnesses the power of the Morning Star to oblitterate their foes..

Overexplosion.name: Over-explosion
Overexplosion.desc: The user charges up... and blows up, with explosions as powerful as nuclear ones. The user faints in the process.

Edge.name: Edge
Edge.desc: The user dons a Fedora. Just the sight instantly defeats all that stare upon your beautiful form.

ColdBreath.name: Cold Breath
ColdBreath.desc: The user blows cold breath to those around them. May freeze the target.

DapMeUp.name: DapMeUp
DapMeUp.desc: If hit it'll paralyse the target by covering them inna strange slime kinda thing

Mamakanda.name: Mamakanda
Mamakanda.desc: Supresses your enemies' magic attacks by a singular stage

Kiss.name: Kiss
Kiss.desc: The user kisses their target, which may confuse them.

Crystalize.name: Crystalize
Crystalize.desc: The user buffs their own defense.

Harden.name: Crystalize
Harden.desc: The user buffs their own defense.

Analysis.name: Analysis
Analysis.desc: The user analyses the target in detail.

FullAnalysis.name: Full Analysis
FullAnalysis.desc: The user analyses the target in full detail.

IcyShield.name: Icy Shield
IcyShield.desc: The user encloses their ally in an icy shield, protecting them.

ThunderShield.name: Thunder Shield
ThunderShield.desc: The user encloses their ally in an thunder shield, protecting them.

RockyShield.name: Rocky Shield
RockyShield.desc: The user makes rocks spike up from the ground, protecting an ally.

Tetrakarn.name: Tetrakarn
Tetrakarn.desc: The user protects their ally from all Physical Skills.

Makarakarn.name: Makarakarn
Makarakarn.desc: The user protects their ally from all Magic Skills.

Roar.desc: The user roars loudly at the foe. Inflicts Dizziness 40% of the time.
Roar.name: Roar

ImposingForm.desc: The user tries to intimidate the foes by pointing their weapons or other methods of attack at them. Inflicts Fear 11% of the time.
ImposingForm.name: Imposing Form

FreezingAir.name: Freezing Air
FreezingAir.desc: The user covers the foe in freezing gas. Inflicts Freeze 40% of the time.

ThunderWings.desc: The user flaps their wings to produce electrical friction. Inflicts Paralysis 40% of the time.
ThunderWings.name: Thunder Wings

ThunderWave.desc: The user discharges sparks of electricity to paralyse the foe. Inflicts paralysis 40% of the time.
ThunderWave.name: Thunder Wave

Embers.desc: The user fires embers at their target. Inflicts Burn 40% of the time.
Embers.name: Embers

Taunt.desc: The user taunts the target. Inflicts Rage 40% of the time.
Taunt.name: Taunt

Rakunda.name: Rakunda
Rakunda.desc: Use this to lower an enemy's End by one stage

Mavisukaja.name: Mavisukaja
Mavisukaja.desc: Raises all allies Perception by one stage

MindReader.name: Mind Reader
MindReader.desc: The user analyses the target in detail.

BlasterShield.name: Blaster Shield
BlasterShield.desc: The user protects their ally with a Gaster Blaster.

BoneShield.name: Bone Shield
BoneShield.desc: The user protects themselves with a bone.

ElectricalShield.name: Electrical Shield
ElectricalShield.desc: The user protects an ally with an electrical shield.

LeafShield.name: Leaf Shield
LeafShield.desc: The user protects an ally with a shield made of leaves.

ShieldOfLeaves.name: Shield of Leaves
ShieldOfLeaves.desc: The user protects themselves with a shield made of leaves.

Glare.desc: The user creepilly glares at the foe. Inflicts Fear 40% of the time.
Glare.name: Glare

GooDrench.desc: The user drenches the target in infectious goop. Inflicts Poison 40% of the time.
GooDrench.name: Goo Drench

ForestCurse.desc: The user inflicts a curse on the foe. Inflicts Fear 80% of the time.
ForestCurse.name: Forest Curse

Makanda.name: Makanda
Makanda.desc: This move will reduce an opponent's Magic by a single stage

Debilitate.name: Debilitate
Debilitate.desc: Debuffs all of the foe's stats.

FreezingTemps.name: FreezingTemps
FreezingTemps.desc: The user surrounds the foe with freezing temperatures, making them too cold and debuffing their attack stat.

HeartSwap.name: Heart Swap
HeartSwap.desc: The user employs its psychic power to switch stat changes with the target.

Mimic.desc: Transforms into the opponent for 2 turns.
Mimic.name: Mimic

Unmimic.desc: Manually reverts to normal, after mimicking an opponent.
Unmimic.name: Unmimic

Tanukimation.desc: Transforms into the opponent for 2 turns.
Tanukimation.name: Tanukimation

De-Tanukimation.desc: Manually reverts to normal, after becoming an opponent.
De-Tanukimation.name: De-Tanukimation

TimeAccelerate.desc: Deals heavy psychic damage in two turns.
TimeAccelerate.name: Time-Accelerate

BurningCurse.name: Burning Curse
BurningCurse.desc: Lays a curse on the foe that inflicts heavy fire damage in two turns.

ConfuseRay.name: Confuse Ray
ConfuseRay.desc: The target is exposed to a sinister ray that inflicts dizziness.

Will-O-Wisp.name: Will-O-Wisp
Will-O-Wisp.desc: The user shoots a sinister, bluish-white flame at the target to inflict a burn.

Tarunda.name: Tarunda
Tarunda.desc: The user debuffs one foe's attack stat.

BulkUp.name: BulkUp
BulkUp.desc: The user tenses its muscles to bulk up its body, raising both its Attack and Defense stats.

TailWhip.name: TailWhip
TailWhip.desc: The user wags its tail cutely, making opposing foes less wary and lowering their endurance.

Hypnosis.name: Hypnosis
Hypnosis.desc: The user employs hypnotic suggestion to make the target fall into a deep sleep.

WebTrap.name: Web Trap
WebTrap.desc: The user puts up a web. If attacked by a physical attack after, the power is halved, weaknesses are nullified, and the attacker's agility is debuffed.

ElectricTrap.name: Electric Trap
ElectricTrap.desc: The user puts up an electrical trap. If attacked by a physical attack after, the power is halved, weaknesses are nullified, and the attacker is paralyzed.

FlareTrap.name: Flare Trap
FlareTrap.desc: The user puts up a fire trap. If attacked by a physical attack after, the power is halved, weaknesses are nullified, and the attacker is burned.

FrostTrap.name: Frost Trap
FrostTrap.desc: The user puts up a freezing trap. If attacked by a physical attack after, the power is halved, weaknesses are nullified, and the attacker is frozen.

BurningTemps.name: BurningTemps
BurningTemps.desc: The user surrounds the foe with burning temperatures, making them too hot and debuffing their attack stat.

Mavisunda.name: Mavisunda
Mavisunda.desc: Debuff to the opposing side's perception.

Matarunda.name: Matarunda
Matarunda.desc: Debuff to the opposing side's attack.

GrassyTerrain.name: Grassy Terrain
GrassyTerrain.desc: The user starts up a grassy terrain to heal everyone on their turn.

Alakunda.name: Alakunda
Alakunda.desc: The user debuffs every single stat of the foes.

Poisma.name: Poisma
Poisma.desc: The user covers the foe in a poisonous gas that may inflict poison

SleepPowder.name: SleepPowder
SleepPowder.desc: The user scatters a big cloud of sleep-inducing dust around the target.

PoisonPowder.name: PoisonPowder
PoisonPowder.desc: The user scatters a cloud of poisonous dust that poisons the target.

SwordsDance.name: Swords Dance
SwordsDance.desc: A frenetic dance to uplift the fighting spirit. This sharply raises the users Attack stat.

SunnyDay.name: Sunny Day
SunnyDay.desc: The user intensifies the sun for five turns, powering up Fire type moves. It lowers the power of Water and Grass type moves.

Hail.name: Hail
Hail.desc: The user performs a mystical chant that makes hail start falling from the sky. It damages all battlers every turn.

RainDance.name: Rain Dance
RainDance.desc: The user summons a heavy rain that falls for five turns, powering up Water type moves. It lowers the power of Fire type moves.

Hopamuda.name: Hopamuda
Hopamuda.desc: A string of words... Well, letters, directed at all enemies. Moderate chance at causing Dizzy.

Taiyo-ken.name: Taiyo-ken
Taiyo-ken.desc: Use a huge flash of light used to disorient and cause your opponent to freeze up

IcyGuard.name: IcyGuard
IcyGuard.desc: The user uses their Ice powers to raise up a single ally's endurance.

NuclearTrap.name: NuclearTrap
NuclearTrap.desc: The user puts up a nuclear trap. If attacked by a physical attack after, the power is halved, weaknesses are nullified and the attacker is poisoned.

OrgiaMode.name: Orgia Mode
OrgiaMode.desc: The user doubles their ATK & MAG stats while halving their END stat for 3 turns. After the time is up, the user falls asleep.

Masukunda.name: Masukunda
Masukunda.desc: Debuff to the opposing side's agility.

EnergyRing.desc: The user restores their allies' MP by 45.
EnergyRing.name: Energy Ring

Revita.name: Revita
Revita.desc: The user restores one ally's MP by 20 MP.

Marevita.name: Marevita
Marevita.desc: The user restores all allies' MP by 20 MP.

Iamgoigntomakeaskilltitlesolongthatyouwo.desc: How long a title can be?

Revitarama.name: Revitarama
Revitarama.desc: The user restores one ally's MP by 50 MP.

Marevitarama.name: Marevitarama
Marevitarama.desc: The user restores all allies' MP by 50 MP.

RevitalizingAura.desc: The user heals one ally for 60 HP.

Dia.desc: The user heals one ally for 60 HP.
Dia.name: Dia

Media.desc: The user heals all allies for 60 HP.
Media.name: Media

Smooch.name: Smooch
Smooch.desc: Smooch an ally to give them a refreshing recovery by 75 HP.

HealRing.desc: The user restores their allies' HP by 80.
HealRing.name: HealRing

Undead-Like_(Teammates).name: Undead-Like_(Teammates)
Undead-Like_(Teammates).desc: The user heals one ally with blood & mystical powers of necromancy by 110HP.

Undead-Like_(Newborn).name: Undead-Like_(Newborn)
Undead-Like_(Newborn).desc: The user summons a new ally with mystical powers of necromancy with a 110HP recovery.

EnergyAria.desc: The user restores their allies' MP by 120.
EnergyAria.name: EnergyAria

Mediarama.desc: The user heals all allies for 140 HP.

Diarama.name: Diarama

RefreshingAura.desc: The user heals one ally for 140 HP.
RefreshingAura.name: RefreshingAura

HealAria.name: Heal Aria
HealAria.desc: The user restores their allies' HP by 150.

CoolBreeze.name: Cool Breeze
CoolBreeze.desc: The user restores their allies' HP by 150.

ChillyWinds.desc: The user restores their allies' HP by 200.
ChillyWinds.name: Chilly Winds

HealMelody.name: Heal Melody
HealMelody.desc: The user uses psychic powers to restore their allies' HP by 215.

Kindness.name: Kindness
Kindness.desc: Interesting healing power that restores 300 HP to all allies.

Diarahan.desc: The user fully heals one ally.

Mediarahan.desc: The user fully heals all allies.
Mediarahan.name: Mediarahan

RefreshingLightshow.desc: The user fully heals one ally.
RefreshingLightshow.name: Refreshing Lightshow

Patra.name: Patra
Patra.desc: The user cures one ally of their status ailments.

MePatra.name: Me Patra
MePatra.desc: The user cures their allies of their status ailments.

CuringAura.name: Curing Aura
CuringAura.desc: The user cures one ally of their status ailments.

CuringWall.name: Curing Wall
CuringWall.desc: The user cures their allies of their status ailments.

LifePowder.name: Life Powder
LifePowder.desc: The user revives a downed ally, with a 3rd of their max HP

Recarm.desc: The user revives a downed ally, with half of their max HP
Recarm.name: Recarm

Samarecarm.desc: The user fully restores a downed foe.
Samarecarm.name: Samarecarm

Bloom.name: Bloom
Bloom.desc: The user blooms and hands the things they produce to an ally, restoring 200 HP.

RegenI.name: Regenerate I
RegenI.desc: The user recovers 5% of their Max HP at the start of every turn.

InvigI.name: Invigorate I
InvigI.desc: The user recovers 5% of their Max MP at the start of every turn.

InvigII.name: Invigorate II
InvigII.desc: The user recovers 6% of their Max MP at the start of every turn.

RegenII.name: Regenerate II
RegenII.desc: The user recovers 6% of their Max HP at the start of every turn.

InvigIII.name: Invigorate III
InvigIII.desc: The user recovers 8% of their Max MP at the start of every turn.

RegenIII.name: Regenerate III
RegenIII.desc: The user recovers 8% of their Max HP at the start of every turn.

DodgePhys.name: Dodge Phys
DodgePhys.desc: A Passive Skill that raises evasion chance against physical skills.

RestoringAura.desc: A Passive Skill that restores 15 MP every turn.
RestoringAura.name: Restoring Aura

FreezeBoost.desc: A Passive Skill that boosts Ice Type Skills by 15%.

PsyBoost.desc: A Passive Skill that boosts Psychic Type Skills by 15%.

HardKnuckle.desc: The user's Strike Type Skills are boosted by 15%.

HealingAura.name: Healing Aura

MoltenBody.name: Molten Body
MoltenBody.desc: A Passive Skill that damages the attacker if they use a physical skill.

FireAmp.name: FireAmp
FireAmp.desc: The user's Fire Type Skills have their power boosted by 30%.

FreezeAmp.name: FreezeAmp

BlessAmp.name: BlessAmp
BlessAmp.desc: Bless attacks are powered up by 30%

Teleport.name: Teleport
Teleport.desc: The user teleports out of the way of an incoming physical attack.

RestoringLight.name: RestoringLight
RestoringLight.desc: This skill restores 35 HP per turn.

Swordbreaker.name: Swordbreaker
Swordbreaker.desc: The user has a 40% chance to change the affinity of physical attacks to resist.

SharpParry.name: Sharp Parry
SharpParry.desc: Parry physical attacks 25% of the time.

ShadowCounter.name: Shadow Counter
ShadowCounter.desc: Delve into the shadows to avoid physical attacks and counter them 20% of the time.

SidestepCounter.name: Sidestep Counter
SidestepCounter.desc: A Passive Skill that raises evasion chance against physical skills by about 15%, and counters them with a slash type skill with 100 power.

ElusionCounterattack.name: Elusion Counterattack
ElusionCounterattack.desc: A Passive Skill that raises evasion chance against physical skills by about 25%, and counters them with a slash type skill with 200 power.

CruelCounter.name: Cruel Counter
CruelCounter.desc: A Passive Skill that raises evasion chance against physical skills by about 15%, and counters them with a pierce type skill.

ProjectileRedirection.desc: A Passive Skill that stops time to repel Magic Attacks that are Strike, Pierce or Slash, back at the opponent.
ProjectileRedirection.name: ProjectileRedirection

Navinity.name: Navinity
Navinity.desc: Every time someone uses a skill that helps the team in some way, the user's affinity count raises by 1 and maxes at 10. When the battle ends the user's affinity count resets to 0.

IceAmp.name: IceAmp
IceAmp.desc: Boosts ice-type attack skill power by 30%

IceAura.name: IceAura
IceAura.desc: Buffs Ice attacks by a whole 60%

WonderGuard.name: Wonder Guard
WonderGuard.desc: The user is immune to all attacking skills they are not weak to.

Exhaust.name: Exhaust
Exhaust.desc: The user has their energy slowly drained over time. This could be for a variety of reasons, including transformations or something else.

Anti-ContactZap.name: Anti-ContactZap
Anti-ContactZap.desc: The user discharges a surge of electricity as a self-defense mechanism (Attack not included).
